description_for_human: Real-time Tezos blockchain dashboard with live network statistics.
description_for_model: Tezos Systems provides real-time blockchain metrics for the Tezos network: baker (validator) counts, tz4/BLS key adoption, staking ratios, issuance rates, transaction volumes, governance participation, smart contract ecosystem stats, and protocol upgrade history. Tezos is a self-amending proof-of-stake blockchain that has completed 21 protocol upgrades with zero hard forks since its mainnet launch in June 2018. Data is sourced from the TzKT indexer API and Tez Capital endpoints, refreshed every 2 minutes.
